      • getExplicitTestTargets

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<BuildTarget> getExplicitTestTargets(com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<BuildTarget> buildTargets,
                                                                                         TargetGraph projectGraph,
                                                                                         boolean shouldIncludeDependenciesTests)
        Parameters:
        buildTargets - The set of targets for which we would like to find tests
        projectGraph - A TargetGraph containing all nodes and their tests.
        shouldIncludeDependenciesTests - Should or not include tests that test dependencies
        Returns:
        A set of all test targets that test any of buildTargets or their dependencies.

      • getExplicitTestTargets

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<BuildTarget> getExplicitTestTargets(TargetGraphAndTargetNodes targetGraphAndTargetNodes,
                                                                                         boolean shouldIncludeDependenciesTests)
        Parameters:
        targetGraphAndTargetNodes - target graph and the set of target nodes for which we would like to find tests
        shouldIncludeDependenciesTests - Should or not include tests that test dependencies
        Returns:
        A set of all test targets that test any of buildTargets or their dependencies.

      • getExplicitTestTargets

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<BuildTarget> getExplicitTestTargets(Iterable<TargetNode<?,?>> nodes)
        Parameters:
        nodes - Nodes whose test targets we would like to find
        Returns:
        A set of all test targets that test the targets in nodes.
